Open 'https://www.example.com/login'
Verify the 'Log In' button is visible, has text 'Log In', font size 16px, font weight 500, background color #007bff
Verify the 'Log In' button on hover transitions background color to #0056b3 over 200ms, border changes to 1px solid #004085, and text color remains #ffffff
Verify the 'Log In' button has width 120px, height 40px, and is centered horizontally
Verify the 'Email Address' input field has placeholder text 'your@email.com', font size 14px, color #6c757d
Verify the 'Email Address' input field is initially enabled, has border 1px solid #ced4da, padding 8px top/bottom and 12px left/right
Verify the 'Email Address' input field when focused changes border to 1px solid #80bdff with shadow animation lasting 300ms
Verify the 'Email Address' input field's left position is 20px relative to its parent container
Open 'https://www.example.com/products/item1'

Verify the main product image has source 'product_main.jpg', loads within 500ms, displays a 'PREVIEW' watermark, rendered dimensions 600x400px, natural dimensions 1200x800px, alt text 'Premium leather shoes', and top margin 20px
Open 'https://www.example.com/dashboard'
Verify the navigation link 'Analytics' is visible, has text 'Analytics', font size 15px, font family 'Roboto'
Verify the navigation link 'Analytics' when active/selected has background color #e9ecef, text color #007bff, padding 10px on all sides, and border radius 4px
Verify the navigation link 'Analytics' has x coordinate 0px and y coordinate 100px relative to the viewport
Open 'https://www.example.com/video/tutorial'
Verify the video player's 'Play' button is visible, has width 60px, height 30px, and aria-label 'Play Video'
Verify the video is initially muted and not fullscreen
Click the 'Play' button
Verify the video transitions from muted to unmuted in 100ms
Verify the 'Play' button's text changes to 'Pause'
Open 'https://www.example.com/category/electronics'
Verify exactly 12 product cards are displayed, each 250px wide, 300px high, with border 1px solid #dee2e6 and background color #ffffff
Verify the product count display shows 'Showing 12 of 24 items' with font size 14px and color #343a40
Verify the pagination element is at the bottom of the page, 40px from the viewport bottom, and its text has font family 'Arial'
Open 'https://www.example.com/settings'
Click the 'Open Dialog' button
Verify the modal dialog appears visible, centered horizontally and vertically, with width 500px and height 300px
Verify the modal dialog's background overlay has opacity 0.7 and background color #000000
Verify the modal dialog has border radius 8px
Verify the 'Close' button within the modal has text 'Close' and color #6c757d
Open 'https://www.example.com/contact'
Verify the 'Submit' button is initially disabled, has background color #6c757d, and text color #ffffff
Fill in the form fields
Verify the 'Submit' button becomes enabled, its background color changes to #28a745, text color remains #ffffff, and font weight is 600
Verify the 'Submit' button has padding 12px vertical and 20px horizontal, and border radius 4px
Verify the 'Submit' button's x position is 50px from the left edge
Open 'https://www.example.com/bookings'
Verify the date picker input field has placeholder 'Select Date', font size 14px, width 180px, and border 1px solid #ced4da
Select date '2023-10-26'
Verify the input field's value is '26/10/2023' and its text color is #212529
Verify the calendar popup has top offset 40px from the input field and background color #ffffff
Open 'https://www.example.com/blog/article1'
Scroll down by 500px
Verify the header remains visible and fixed at the top, having height 60px, background color #ffffff, border bottom 1px solid #e0e0e0, padding 10px vertically, and left and right positions both 0px
Open 'https://www.example.com/gallery'
Verify there are 5 images displayed
Verify each image has width 200px and height 150px
Verify all image alt texts contain 'Gallery item'
Verify the gallery container has margin-top 30px, padding 15px on all sides, and border 1px dashed #cccccc
Verify the first image's source is 'gallery_img_1.jpg'
Open 'https://www.example.com/profile'
Trigger a success message

Verify the 'Success!' notification appears at top right (x 90%, y 20px) of the viewport, with text 'Operation successful', background color #d4edda, text color #155724, fades out with opacity transition over 3s, border radius 5px, and font size 14px
Open 'https://www.example.com/settings'
Verify the 'Receive Newsletter' checkbox is initially unchecked/not selected
Verify its associated label 'Receive Newsletter' has font size 16px and color #333333
Click the 'Receive Newsletter' checkbox
Verify the checkbox becomes selected and its aria-label changes to 'Newsletter subscription active'
Verify the checkbox is aligned left with 20px margin from its parent
Open 'https://www.example.com/upload'
Start a file upload
Verify the progress bar is visible, has height 10px, and background color #e9ecef
Verify its inner bar's width changes to reflect percentage value with color #007bff as upload progresses
Verify the 'Upload Progress:' label has font weight 700
Open 'https://www.example.com/editor'
Click the 'Options' dropdown
Verify the dropdown menu appears, containing exactly 5 items
Verify each dropdown item has padding 8px vertical and 15px horizontal
Verify the 'Save' option has text 'Save', font size 14px, and color #333333
Verify the 'Save' option on hover background color becomes #f8f9fa over 150ms
Open 'https://www.example.com/reports'
Verify the table header 'Product Name' has font weight 700, font size 14px, and text align 'left'
Verify corresponding data cells have text align 'left' and font size 13px
Verify each table row has border bottom 1px solid #e0e0e0 and height 40px
Verify each table row has background color #f8f9fa on hover
Verify the first data cell's text value is 'Laptop Pro X'
Open 'https://www.example.com/media/clip.mp4'
Click the 'Fullscreen' button
Verify the video enters fullscreen mode and fills the entire viewport
Verify the video controls (Play/Pause, Mute) are visible, positioned at bottom of screen with y-coordinate at viewport height - 50px, and opacity 0.9
Verify the 'Mute' button's aria-label is 'Toggle Mute', its width is 40px, and height is 40px
Open 'https://www.example.com/homepage'
Verify there are 3 navigation dots below the carousel
Verify the first dot is initially active/selected, with background color #007bff and border radius 50%
Verify inactive dots have background color #cccccc and opacity 0.6
Verify each dot has width 10px, height 10px, and left margin 5px
Open 'https://www.example.com/dashboard'
Hover over the 'Help' icon

Verify the tooltip appears visible, with text 'Click for assistance', font size 12px, background color #333333, text color #ffffff, padding 8px on all sides, top position 10px below the 'Help' icon, centered horizontally relative to the icon, and opacity 1
Open 'https://www.example.com/shop'
Apply the filter 'Category: Laptops'
Verify the product list updates, showing exactly 8 products
Verify the displayed product count changes to 'Showing 8 products'
Verify each product card's width is 280px, height is 350px, with border radius 5px and background color #ffffff
Verify the first product's label is 'Laptop Pro 13'
